title: No longer can have bots in custom games
body: I personally sometimes enjoy playing 1v5 games against bots, which I would do by creating a custom games. I enjoy these games very much because I get to see champions at maximum strength. However, in the new client you cannot add bots to custom games anymore so I cannot play these games. Please add this back in.

replies.body: Hey wiggieBob, Bots for custom games are incoming next patch :)
Thanks a lot. I as well appreciate it.
i am scared that they are going to remove this i hope not because sometimes i love training to play new champs trying builds and mostly i have high  ping so i play vs bots
sadly it is not their in the new client. There is no add bot feature in the custom lobby
I agree, sometimes i like to just go kick some but and get 40 kills. It's alos a great way to try new champions without any stress. If you decide early on you don't like the champ you can just quit.

I also love training with bots and getting full builds. If that option is truly gone then I won't be playing these games either. Which sucks because I have a lot invested and own most of the champs and skins.
